seq.a: The process starts by reviewing the order
The staff should check if all the requested items are available
the staff has to inform customer about a potential delay and order the missing products
the customer should be informed about the no longer available items
waiting an average of x days for the delivery
the staff should check again if all products are on store
the staff recollects all products and prepare a package
The courier is then informed about the pre-processed package
The courier company informs the client about a potential delay until there are enough human resources to process the delivery
the package is picked up by the designed driver
A centralized service decides the best route to deliver all driver's packages
she should update the system so all stakeholders are notified
